intents.checks_repo_cli_argparse_policy: Keep argparse parser creation centralized to parser modules.
intents.checks_repo_packages_atlasctl_root_shape: Keep packages/atlasctl root deterministic and minimal.
intents.checks_repo_modules_reachability: Prevent dead/unregistered check modules from drifting.
intents.checks_repo_checks_canonical_location: Ensure check implementations live under canonical checks paths.
intents.checks_repo_commands_help_docs_drift: Keep generated CLI docs aligned with registered command surface.
intents.checks_repo_commands_import_lint: Prevent cross-domain command import boundary violations.
intents.checks_repo_command_module_cli_intent: Require command.py modules to be parser+runner entry shims.
intents.checks_repo_commands_surface_stability: Lock command registry output via goldens.
intents.checks_repo_dependency_owner_justificati: Require ownership and justification for dependency declarations.
